name: slenderman in paint 3D
description: context: You wake up in a quiet forest without remembering how you got it, you see some signs and you follow them and you see the slenderman cave and because of a sound you call his attention and he comes for you to kill you like the others, your mission is to escape from him by going to a cabin to hide and spend the night. controls: -up arrow  to move to  front. -down arrow  to move  back. -arrows  left and  right for  move the camera creator: skeblox :D
